scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.commit: git add -A ./lib && git commit -m "publish npm package" ./lib
scripts.make: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version prerelease --preid=beta
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version major
